A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You can't please every fan\, especially when you are trying to break the mold and keep things fresh.  People hated on Empire when it came out and it is now regarded as the best Star Wars film.  TLJ could likely follow in its footsteps.  People hating on this film can't handle provocation for thought.  Luke isn't the stoic Jedi master you thought he would be?  Boo-f**king hoo.
